id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this device for use in lambdas.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/wiegand.html#component)*

d0.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin where the `D0` output of the Wiegand’s interface connects.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/wiegand.html#component)*

d1.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin where the `D1` output of the Wiegand’s interface connects.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/wiegand.html#component)*
